items.title: Beyoncé Just Launched a New Whiskey – SirDavis
items.excerpt: Beyoncé Knowles-Carter has done a lot of impressive things over the course of her career. But that highlight list has, until now, excluded launching her own spirits brand, a particularly popular hobby among celebrities. That’s just changed with the introduction of SirDavis, a …

items.title: Woodford Reserve Released a New Blended Malt Whiskey
items.excerpt: Woodford Reserve is best known for its flagship bourbon, but in recent years the Kentucky distillery has expanded its purview to include a rye whiskey, wheat whiskey, and other unique expressions. The latest to debut is a Woodford Reserve Blended Malt, a new limited-edition bo…
